name: Zephyr Blade
text: Without formal training, you learned your techniques in a haphazard fashion, unlocking your potential with each contest, awakening new techniques as you blended psionic power with your weapon strikes. At some point during your battles, you began to hear a faint wailingâ€”subtle, quiet, but definitely present. Now when you fight, the breeze whips up into a storm, lending new strength to your attacks.

features.beguilingAdvantage(11thLevel): Your melee attacks against dazed, slowed, or stunned enemies deal extra damage to them equal to your Charisma modifier
features.zephyrAction(11thLevel): When you spend an action point to take an extra action, you are insubstantial and phasing until the start of your next turn
features.speedOfTheWind(16thLevel): You gain a +2 bonus to speed

flavorText: Can you stop the wind? Can you grasp it in your hands? If not, you stand no chance of stopping me.
